description: LOCAL PARTNERSHIP FOR URBAN POVERTY ALLEVIATION

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Expanded employment and poverty alleviation opportunities for poor and vulnerable in urban areas through effective local governance, community partnerships and basic services delivery.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Urban Partnerships for Poverty

subproject.description:
This IP outlines how UNDP proposes to promote an enhanced urban governance policy environment and build UNDP's capacity to take a lead role in supporting the GoB to achieve its urban governance objectives. 
This IP consists of three componants: i) the formation of a Bangladesh Urban Forum; ii) urban governance research ; and iii) an urban governance scoping mission.
subproject.title: IP-GUGP

title: URBAN POVERTY ALLEVIATION
